title: Bug fix
text: The latest update has this bug that is really annoying. This is my typical scenario on my iPhone 8, I go through my feed and preview videos without clicking on them. I just watch a little bit of it as a preview and typically put no interested on it because either I have already seen the video or it doesn‚Äôt interest me. Then when I do find a video I want to watch and I begin to play it, the audio from the last video I previewed and put as not interested begins to play at the same time as the audio from the video I am playing. The only way to get it to stop is to close the app and relaunch. So now I can‚Äôt go through my recommendations previewing or getting rid of other videos without this problem happening. Please fix

title: Subscription box
text: I highly recommend updating the way the subscription box works. I think you should keep it the same where newest videos at the top and the further you go down the older the video is; but you should make an update where it makes it so that after you‚Äôve watched a video that was In your subscription box it goes down to a separate section. That way all the videos that you haven‚Äôt watched in your subscription box are at the top so u don‚Äôt miss any or have to scroll super far down to find them. Also if they were super old videos or you didn‚Äôt watch them because they weren‚Äôt interesting you can always click the hide option on the side of the video. Your welcome for the recommendation. Haha Thanks.

title: Saved money
text: I have learned so much watching the videos on you tube. When I get stuck while trying to complete a project, I turn to you tube. Before I start a project, I turn to you tube. I estimate that 80 percent of time, I find the answer to my concern. Not once have I ever caused a problem from watching a you tube Video in my attempt to complete a project or make a repair.  I also find great ideas and hacks watching you tube. Finally, my favorite forms of entertainment can be found on you tube.  I watch replays of college football games, coach and player interviews, shortened versions of football games, and music videos from the past. Thank you You Tube.

title: Would give 0 stars if I could <3
text:
Videos only buffer last second, meaning constant stops. There's a MINIMUM of four advertisements, almost every single video, many of which are genuinely offensive to the senses. Advertisements that violate ToS are not reportable on mobile. For creators, there's a constant drive to produce content in order to even show up in their followers feeds, burning people out and ensuring that small accounts don't get off the ground. User feedback is near meaningless. Every new update is hostile to actual users. Ridiculous <3

EDIT: The ads have gotten even more hostile. Most of them are unskippable, and the "skippable" ones don't count the five-second timer properly (taking closer to 10 seconds, and not even counting down so they go from "5" to "1"). If I try to view the comments section while an ad is playing, it will become an inescapable full-screen. Exhausting.

title: Please Address This
text:
To whom it may concern, 
I would like to make a complaint regarding the view counting of B/T/S 'ON' Official MV. After its release at 12am KST on the 28th of February, it received 9.7 million views in only one hour. However, beyond that point, the view count increased relatively slowly (approximately 1 million per hour), which seems unusual as the fanbase is very big, and ‚Äì as observed by several trends and hashtags on twitter and other social media platforms ‚Äì did not stop watching the video after the one hour mark. There are also websites that claim to display a video‚Äôs views in real time, and these websites very clearly displayed large numbers of views being deleted for no apparent reason. 
Most pressingly, just ten minutes before the video‚Äôs 24 hour mark was due to be hit, approximately 5 million views were, again, removed from the video‚Äôs view count. No justification has been given for this decision and it is grossly unfair to the dedicated fans who have been promoting and watching the video for the past day. 
I and the rest of B/T/S‚Äô fanbase would like to ask that you acknowledge our presence, as well as the effort and production that has gone into this music video by B/T/S, by examining your algorithms and reinstating some, if not all, of the removed views. 
Thank you in advance for your time,
EA

title: Feel Like Feeling Blue
text:
Remembering my buddies during the war and memories we shared while back in the world.  Particularly one night in Okinawa, Four Corners; where the brothers hung out because they did not want us uptown. We saluted everyone with a drink and asked to remember that particular night because many are going to die in the war and our memories should not be forgotten, that we were a Band of Brothers that will share our memories until the last one is gone.

I am listening to the Temptations reminiscing those days and the fact that all my war buddies have passed on, and I am uncertain if there are anyone else out there similar situated. 

Here is a toast to ‚ÄúMemories ‚Äúüé∂üá∫üá∏ü•Ç

title: Bugs, but overall a great app!
text: This app is overall a great app. There are some bugs, like when i search something and click whatever i want to watch, i can‚Äôt go back to my home page or shorts. that‚Äôs not a huge deal to me at least because i can always exit out of the app and go back in, but it would still be nice if it got fixed. you can add lots of parental controls, which i think is great! one thing i really love about the ‚Äòshorts‚Äô is that there‚Äôs a one minute limit. the reason i like it is because YouTubes main thing is long videos, and if the Shorts get longer, there‚Äôs no point in the Shorts or the longer videos anyways. that‚Äôs all i have to say, thank you for reading this review :)

title: Annoying Bugs that need to be fixed. (Volume)
text:
I spoke with Apple earlier today and I had an issue with Horizontal orientation on the YT application only, this has nothing to due with it not flipping but with the volume slider/bar not showing up in a Landscape/horizontal orientation. This is very annoying due to the fact that I cannot see the volume when trying to watch a video. The Apple specialist also had the same issue and also persisted, these seems like a glitch or bug because I was able to fix it temporarily for a short period of time. 

Other than that, I love the app, the UI can use some work but overall 9/10 app.

title: Care; Peace; Love
text:
"Cast all of your care

Upon Him, for He

Careth for you."

"Be careful ( full of

Care) for nothing..."

Not even the next

Thought!

"Take My yoke upon

You and learn of Me...

For my yoke is easy

And my burden is

Light."

I am reminded of a collection of priests who owned a flower shop in town. Given their upstanding stature they had a solid clientele. 

This ate into the business of a long standing flower shop owner in town who had the sole flower shop in town decades before the priest‚Äôs had set up theirs. 

So he went over to talk to the priest‚Äôs about the dilemma they posed to his earnings. They did not change anything and continued to attract ever more customers, putting the original flower shop owner in dire straits. 

He went back to talk to the priests and they would not help him out. So the original flower shop owner said he would have to bring Hugh over if they didn‚Äôt help him out. Well nothing changed.

So the original flower shop owner sent Hugh over to the priest‚Äôs flower shop where he completely demolished the shop

It goes to show that Hugh, and only Hugh can put out florist friars!

title: Skipping Chapters Bug
text:
I have no idea what causes this, but sometimes double tapping to rewind or fast forward ten seconds will cause the video to go to the previous or next chapter entirely without giving you a way to return to your previous spot in the video.

This bug is especially annoying because you cannot disable this function and you can already choose which chapter you‚Äôd like to go to without needing to double tap. You can select the chapter from the video description or drag the player dot to the start of the chapter you‚Äôd like. Being unable to disable this feature has done far more harm than good.

title: The algorithm runs unchecked
text: Lately my recommend videos tries to force feed me content by recommending the same 10 videos in varying order with every refresh until I am frustrated enough to click on one just to get new content to appear. But that counts as a view to the algorithm and supports that creators advertising stats without revocation . No deletion of my watch history will stop similar content from being recommended. The algorithm serves a purpose. But not allowing the watcher to have any way of letting the algorithm know when we don‚Äôt like what it‚Äôs recommending is either an oversight or a bad decision. Create an unwatch button that removes unwanted support and traffic to videos. Or at least add a stop recommending button to pass on a video without watching it.

title: Great app except...
text:
When I use the app on the Apple TV connecting a keyboard to type anything in the search option no longer works and is a real pain and huge bummer. Instead I have to use the remote app that I hate‚Ä¶ just why? And then also the interface on the tv vs the computer vs the iPad/iPhone is all different! What‚Äôs that about?! I prefer the interface of the iPhone/iPad but I also love the ‚Äòadd to queue‚Äô option on the computer. 

Can you guys just update all the app version from the computer, tv and iPhone/iPad to be the same? Exactly just like the iPhone/iPad interface with the addition of the ‚Äòadd to queue‚Äô option. Please and thank you!

title: Interface Inconsistent with Desktop
text:
As much as it tries, the interface, at the time of writing this, does not have parity with the HTML browser interface. In spite of iPad having a keyboard, certain functions differ, both visually and functionally, without necessity. There is no left sidebar for subscriptions; I can't find the mac equivalent of escape on this thing (though it's probably around here somewhere and I have yet to find it); I can't figure out what key to use for enter/exit fullscreen; and I'm probably missing or forgetting something.

Imagine having consistent experiences from well-thought-out designs over half a century after the inception of electronic computers from capitalist corporations worth hundreds of billions of dollars. Hah.

title: 2020 review
text:
After all of this time as an IPAD app, I don't understand why I still cant review the story features on my IPAD.  Also, I wish it had a sleep timer feature so I could listen to particular audio combos such as sleep music, that would turn off after a set period of time.

As another feature request, I would like a customizable shortcut screen where I could add quick buttons to turn off (or on) CC, quickly change video play speed from normal to double speed (and vice versa), and quickly turn in and off rotation lock.  For example, I am constantly using rotation lock on my IPAD (which is a multiple step process on an Ipad.). 

Be icia

title: More ads = less time watching
text:
I‚Äôm not one to write reviews but I‚Äôve been using this app since it‚Äôs advent. I‚Äôve never been to upset about the ads but it literally gets worse and worse over time without thought about the consumer or the content creators. 

First the ads started getting longer, okay no big deal, I can skip them after 5 seconds. Now suddenly there‚Äôs 2 ads totaling 10 seconds. Still not terrible. Recently they‚Äôve moved into 2 unskippable 15 second ads. I literally have to watch a commercial break at the beginning of some videos. It pretty much turns me off to the point where I just close the app. 

That‚Äôs not even to mention the subversive methodology of some ad targeting. For me, the algorithm has determined that I enjoy listening to videos when I go to sleep. I woke up one time not knowing what I was listening to and looked at my screen to find a (no lie) 2 hour ad playing on my phone. All of that information just assaulting my sub to unconscious mind for 2 hours. Creators now see pennies on the dollar of that ad revenue. 

If there was another option I would switch in a heartbeat. What made this platform good was that it was different than TV. Now it seems intent on falling into the old way of doing things so the media conglomerates that worked on television can continue to work here.

title: Accessibility
text: You tube provides me the ability to access a HUGE variety of entertainment & information all in one place. From music to comedy to the arts & humanity. From how to make toffee to gardening to build a work bench. I especially appreciate that just about anyone can contribute they're own videos about anything. Being not a very sociable person, it helps me feel in touch with the rest of the world. Only thing I don't like, when listening to someones collection of music while taking a bath (for example), they often interrupt it in the middle to ask if i'm still listening. I have to drop what I'm doin to tap "yes". Or it'll boot me out. I mean, what's the point of that? Why do you even care?

title: Amazing app besides one thing...
text: This app is amazing and I love everything about it. Well, almost everything about it. It‚Äôs a really great app that has a really good format and functionality but there is one thing about this app that I absolutely hate more than anything. The swipe to next/previous video feature is possibly the worst feature anyone could have ever made for a video app like this. 95% of the time I accidentally swipe to the next video and have to immediately swipe back which is of course followed by an ad. The feature is so sensitive that almost anything can activate it. I have never been more annoyed and disappointed in a feature. I am positive that not many people would miss this feature if you removed it.

title: Put your employees to work!
text:
Since ios 8 came out, I've only seen one patch from you guys. What are your employees doing all day? Here are a few immediate issues that need fixed asap:
 1) When commenting on a vid and the vid ends prior to comment completion, the comment box shrinks up and you have to start all over again.
 2) Why is there no edit button once comments are posted from smart phone?
3) The channel switches over to the google account by itself which is an issue all its own but the main frustration is that you can't switch back in the options without having to sign out all together. So either your QC team is filling their time with something other than work, or you allow it and don't care since working on mergers is more important than assuring a quality product. Being so filthy flippin' rich, there is no excuse. Hire Terry Tate and straighten out your office! What are you sitting around for? Get back to work!!

title: we need quiet ads!!!
text: i don‚Äôt mind the influx of ads (i know they need to make money somehow) but i hate when i‚Äôm trying to listen to rainforest sounds or asmr and then getting interrupted by a loudass Target ad. i wish there was a way i could get the calming soap, medicine, charity, Chrome, and mattress ads when i‚Äôm trying to sleep, because i don‚Äôt mind the energetic Target, Khols, Macys, Michaels, and television show ads when i have something more energetic on, but i would really not like to be woken up so i can save fifteen percent off of jeans and flannels when i get a Target card or whatever else. all i can say is, the TempurPedic, Olay, and Google Chrome ads are way easier on the ears.

title: still no dislikes
text: Ive seen a few small ui changes over the last year eg; the skip button being more oval instead of a rectangle, more suggested sections at the top in the recommended, stuff like that. But they continue not adding back the one thing people have been upset at and that's showing dislikes on a video, it never made any sense to get rid of them in the first place because dislikes are an important feature to tell if a video if proper information. example; you need a walkthrough video for a game and because its not showing likes/dislikes or comments you would have no way to know if that information is correct, just like other examples people have given with CPR. Dislikes are almost a VITAL part of yt and they got rid of it for no reason.

title: Why, just why???
text: First of all who thought it was a good idea to remove the dislike button? The reason for this is because I understand you want to help creators, but by removing the dislike button is not going to help. They can still see it and how are others going to know which one is real and which one is fake. Guess who can‚Äôt tell which video is a scammer if not üôÉ. This would only make it worse not only that, but I haven‚Äôt updated the app yet and some how number of dislikes on a video suddenly disappear. Not cool bro, not cool. Even if it was started but stopped the update should be there for the old version unless the new one was in. Please fix this problem there are so many other ways to help small content creators, like giving them more money per video or a larger portion from the ads that appear in the video. Not removing the dislike button.

title: Glaring Double Standards in policy
text: There is a grossly over enforced bias against conservatism. This platform is yours to control. I understand that. Your policies however (especially the most recent changes following the last POTUS) are revoltingly one sided from a political perspective. Half of this country is desperately looking for the next platform. It‚Äôs a toss up at the moment, but when it‚Äôs found, and agreed upon, you won‚Äôt be able to keep from being eaten by your own. You nurtured ‚Äúcancel culture‚Äù, and they (the self righteous left) will come for you too. In the meantime, I still come to see people doing absurd things for ‚Äúlikes‚Äù, and the delusion that they will become wealthy somehow.

title: You tube education and entertainment
text:
In this world of fake news and nothing but sadness being shared. I have turned to watching nothing but you tube videos. To pass the time. Not only am I entertained but I have gotten more entertaining and educationally positive content at the click of a remote than any major tv station could provide me. I‚Äôve never been depressed but more so inspired ! I have spent countless hours in an on line class room type setting learning ,
Smiling, even laughing more so than I have turning in to regular tv. No one one here has tried to change me. It has even inspired me to make purchase. Thank you to all the you tubers . Your making a difference one vlog at a time.

title: Music Killers
text:
I found this very interesting group of young men had released a song! I very much liked this song and hoped to see these boys succeed. I woke up and decided to search again to see their success, I saw 140 million views! I was overjoyed! But then later I watched it again and noticed... it has dropped to 43 million, how does one unwatch a video? I‚Äôm very confused and think this app needs some tweaking since it‚Äôs new and wanted to let the developer know that they have a few visual glitches in their system and to return those boys hardworking video back to the original view count of 140 million! New apps are hard to make so developer keep at it and don‚Äôt worry, you‚Äôll get it right eventually.
Love, Karen

title: Easy to understand
text: It‚Äôs a relief to find instructions that are simple, direct , explain any computer speak terminology used. Using computer and iPhone requires translation, the terms are foreign.  Another key for me is realizing, many years ago, that there are several ways to accomplish the same things. I wondered why I couldn‚Äôt learn and retain because helpers showed me ‚Äútheir‚Äù way of doing things.  Extremely frustrating when on the job and trainers are available for only short periods too.  This and a community available class are helping making some sense now.  So grateful for this‚Ä¶. Suggest others find a source directed at seniors

title: Top of the line app, one big snag
text:
I love this app. I use it 5-6 hours a day. You can always nit pick something so I‚Äôll just go with the big issue that I thought was worth taking off a star. When I am listening to the playlist, and shuffle the songs it does not do a random shuffle. And if it happens to play the last song in the list, it just stops.

This has been an issue for years. Please make it so that the shuffle function randomizes what plays next (based on the entire playlist), does not repeat videos, and does not stop just because it plays the final song in the list. It should go through every video in the playlist in a random order until all are played.üòá

Thank you for the otherwise awesome app. üôÇ

title: Utube
text: Im a Vietnam veteran with agent orange,I like country and the old rock and roll. But you people have got another utube that you are forcing us to go to and make a lot of money ,so therefore you people are destroying the old utube by filling it with commercials and I like Elvis Presley but now yaw are destroying his name by putting up foreigners to sing his songs and they really look stupid,and you are lying by putting up 50+ songs and it goes off the air after 5-8 songs ,we the people are dissatisfied with you where we use to hear 50+ songs , but now with all your false advertising,you are not giving us what you are telling us ,with all the commercials now you stick a song in between the commercials,it‚Äôs really getting bad and you know exactly what you want,by commercial free you want 10 dollars a month for the new utube which we already had until you started this  bulls‚Äît and now yaw are disgusting to the people with set incomes

title: Swipe left and right update
text: I noticed this morning that on the app, there‚Äôs now a feature that lets you swipe left or right for another video. This feature has been very annoying so far and it‚Äôs been less than 24 hours. Whenever I want to wipe something off my screen I would switch to a new video when I clearly don‚Äôt want to. In fact that‚Äôs how I accidentally discovered this feature. I looked through settings and could not find a way to turn this off, which as I said makes the app more annoying. Prior to this feature I had no real issues with the video player. I would prefer they either remove the feature or give an option for us to remove it. Other than that I feel the app is great

title: I like watching it, but there is one problem
text:
I use this app a lot, and there is something that‚Äôs happened recently that is upsetting. This has happened twice now. I go to watch a video, which works fine, but when I tried to exit the video it froze. I tried scrolling through and it is barely working. I tried to press the home button, but it wasn‚Äôt working. Neither was the power button. I tried shutting it down but it didn‚Äôt work. In the end it brought me back to the lock screen, which was weird.

I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs my iPad or if it‚Äôs the app. I‚Äôd like it if that bug was fixed though. I really love this app, so I‚Äôd appreciate it if it worked fine. But this has only happened twice, so I hope it doesn‚Äôt happen again üôÇ

title: Excruciatingly bad performance.
text:
I have an iPhone 6plus, and while I get that my device is a bit old and I shouldn't be expecting buttery smooth performance, at the very least I expect the app to be usable, quite frankly the way it is now, it borderline isn't. 

The scrolling is incredibly bad, and it gets even worse when I have the video window in the corner. I've given up on the comment section because the lag and again terrible scrolling. I literally cannot complete a single task without a stutter or two. And from time to time the app freezes completely forcing me to relaunch it.

The quality switcher has become incredibly obnoxious. I have to go and tap the desired quality multiple times just for it to change, Sometimes I just give up and leave it on auto resolution. This is simply not acceptable 

Ever since YT had a major design change, things have been constantly going down hill with every update, and this was just the cherry on top. At this point your application has no redeeming factors period.

These type of problems really have me wondering if your dev team even demo devices before releasing updates. I know I may sound obnoxious, but if this wasn't such an essential app I wouldn't be complaining. YT is easily the worst app I currently have on my phone. Please, please, pleeeeeeeeeeeeeaaaaase fix it!

title: Watch History
text:
There‚Äôs a problem with the Watch History tab. Whenever I watch a video, that video should pop up in the watch history but it doesn‚Äôt. In fact, nothing appears in the watch history. I cleared the watch history and when I watched a video nothing came up showing that I watched it recently. I even deleted the app and redownloaded it to see if it that worked. Nope. Everything else workin fine though. I dunno if this has happened to anyone else but this happened just today.

EDIT: Never mind. Somehow the problem was fixed on its own. Still would keep an eye out for that, though. Thank you.üòÅ

title: Playlists + overall ‚Äúimproved‚Äù features
text: The new appearance of the playlists on mobile is really annoying. It was fine as a list, made it easy to access with just a click + maybe a short scroll, but now you have to click and scroll even more to get to what you need. Less is more. I just want to be able to go through all my playlists without having to tap and scroll fifty times. There‚Äôs no need to over-complicate already simple features‚Äî it doesn‚Äôt make the app feel ‚Äúrefreshed‚Äù or ‚Äúimproved,‚Äù it just makes it feel cluttered and irritating to get used to. If anything, I‚Äôd rather you guys add new features and leave the old ones alone. There‚Äôs so much more you could work on and improve instead. Thank you.

title: Only here because its a monopoly
text:
Look, this app is not that spectacular. Clickbait out the wazoo, and inappropriate/adult content is still targeted to children. Reporting doesnt seem to do much at all. The removal of dislikes though is probably the worst change though. Creators could already hide like/dislikes, and now all the change has done is make it impossible to know if a video will waste your time or not. The ONLY reason this app is still used is because it has a complete monopoly on the video sharing market. 

On the other hand, YT livestreaming is miles better than twitch, mainly due to how the moderating for YT live is infinitely more fair and fast-acting than Twitch‚Äôs garbage. With a few minor UI changes i can definitely see YT live overtaking twitch, and i really hope it does lol.
